    http://www.opentravel.org/OTM/reservation/v2

    Facet Reservation_Query_ByTraveler

      • http://www.opentravel.org/OTM/reservation/v2:Reservation_Query_ByTraveler

    • Example XML

      <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="yes"?>

<ReservationQueryByTraveler xmlns:ota2-0400="http://www.opentravel.org/OTM/Common/v4" xmlns="http://www.opentravel.org/OTM/reservation/v2">
    <TravelerCriteria>
        <ota2-0400:PersonIdentifier objID="person_1">
            <ota2-0400:Identifier organization="Acme" system="sysABC3344" url="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema">guid12345</ota2-0400:Identifier>
            <ota2-0400:OtherID organization="Acme" system="sysABC3344" url="http://www.OpenTravel.org/ns/OTA2/Common_v01_00">guid12345</ota2-0400:OtherID>
            <ota2-0400:PersonRef>person_1</ota2-0400:PersonRef>
        </ota2-0400:PersonIdentifier>
        <ota2-0400:PersonNameSummary>
            <ota2-0400:Prefix>Mr.</ota2-0400:Prefix>
            <ota2-0400:Given>John</ota2-0400:Given>
            <ota2-0400:Middle>Example String Value</ota2-0400:Middle>
            <ota2-0400:Surname>Smith</ota2-0400:Surname>
        </ota2-0400:PersonNameSummary>
        <Email_Simple>Example String Value</Email_Simple>
        <Telephone_Simple>Example String Value</Telephone_Simple>
    </TravelerCriteria>
    <Verification>
        <ota2-0400:PersonNameSummary>
            <ota2-0400:Prefix>Mr.</ota2-0400:Prefix>
            <ota2-0400:Given>John</ota2-0400:Given>
            <ota2-0400:Middle>Example String Value</ota2-0400:Middle>
            <ota2-0400:Surname>Smith</ota2-0400:Surname>
        </ota2-0400:PersonNameSummary>
        <Email_Simple>Example String Value</Email_Simple>
        <Telephone_Simple>Example String Value</Telephone_Simple>
        <PaymentCard_Masked>1234</PaymentCard_Masked>
    </Verification>
    <TimeSpan end="2016-08-28T04:32:52Z" start="2016-08-22T19:32:52Z"/>
</ReservationQueryByTraveler>

      Example JSON

      {
  "ReservationQueryByTraveler" : {
    "TravelerCriteria" : {
      "@type" : "TravelerCriteria",
      "PersonIdentifier" : {
        "objID" : "person_1",
        "Identifier" : {
          "value" : "guid12345",
          "url" : "http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema",
          "system" : "sysABC3344",
          "organization" : "Acme"
        },
        "OtherID" : [ {
          "value" : "guid12345",
          "url" : "http://www.OpenTravel.org/ns/OTA2/Common_v01_00",
          "system" : "sysABC3344",
          "organization" : "Acme"
        } ],
        "PersonRef" : "person_1"
      },
      "PersonNameSummary" : {
        "Prefix" : [ "Mr." ],
        "Given" : [ "John" ],
        "Middle" : [ "Example String Value" ],
        "Surname" : "Smith"
      },
      "Email_Simple" : "Example String Value",
      "Telephone_Simple" : "Example String Value"
    },
    "Verification" : {
      "@type" : "Verification",
      "PersonNameSummary" : {
        "Prefix" : [ "Mr." ],
        "Given" : [ "John" ],
        "Middle" : [ "Example String Value" ],
        "Surname" : "Smith"
      },
      "Email_Simple" : "Example String Value",
      "Telephone_Simple" : "Example String Value",
      "PaymentCard_Masked" : "1234"
    },
    "TimeSpan" : {
      "value" : null,
      "start" : "2016-08-22T19:32:52Z",
      "end" : "2016-08-28T04:32:52Z"
    }
  }
}

      • Property Summary

        Properties 
        Name Description
        TravelerCriteria
        Traveler information on which the query is being preformed.

        Example Value ???

        Pattern N/A
        Max Occurrences 1

        Example Value ???
        Required false
        Pattern N/A
        Max Occurrences 1

        Example Value ???
